content.title: 無原罪の妊娠の祝日にDuterte：私たちはメアリーの性質をエミュレートしましょう -  CNNフィリピン
content.desc: Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, December 8) - Following recent tirades against the Catholic Church, President Rodrigo Duterte on Saturday said he joins the faithful in commemorating the Feast of the Immaculate Conception. In a message from Malacañang signed by the President, he hailed Virgin Mary, the mother of Jesus Christ, for her simplicity, kindness and humility. "Let us emulate Mary's qualities as a humble and caring person and remain guided by her faithfulness as we strengthen our devotion and nurture our lives with unconditional love and good deeds that will benefit the Filipino peopl...

content.title: Duterteは、カトリック信者に、メアリーの「無私」をエミュレートするように促す -  SunStar Philippines
content.source_nm: サンスターフィリピン
content.desc: DESPITE his recent tirades against Catholic Church leaders, President Rodrigo Duterte on Saturday, December 8, joined the Catholic faithful in commemorating the Feast of the Immaculate Conception of Mary. Duterte, in a message, called on his fellow Filipinos to emulate Mary's "selflessness." Tweets by sunstaronline He was hopeful that the narrative of Mary's Immaculate Conception would serve as a "constant reminder" of her humility and thoughtfulness when she accepted the invitation to be Christ's mother so that the plan of salvation would be realized.
